original_title: Free Water Connections to Schools and Low-Income Families: Water Supply and Drainage Board
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st) – The Water Supply and Drainage Board has made a significant decision to offer complimentary water connections to every school in the region. According to Piyal Padmanatha, the Deputy General Manager of the board, this program aims to prioritize schools situated in areas with adequate water availability.
In addition to the initiative for schools, the Water Supply and Drainage Board has also taken measures to provide free water connections to selected low-income families.
